reviews.review:
Un jeu sympa, mais dont l'intérêt réside dans des parties multijoueurs.

Donc le seul hic est la durée de vie du jeu qui peut vite devenir rébarbatif.

Envie de se défouler, vient faire des "headshoot" dans des morts vivants ;-)
Das Spiel ist schon etwas älter aber den Preis wert.
Norm
Brainless slaughter. I like it.
Играть с друзьями круто в эту игру.А вот одному скучновато!
Отличная игра для тех кому нравится мясо и расчлененка. Рекомендую
Melhor jogo Do mundo pra Mutiplayer
Это игра просто шедевр! Отличный геймплей, графика и даже сюжет! Несколько режимов. Токо трудно создать свой сервер, что бы сыграть с друзьями.

В данной игре вам предстоит играть за выжевшего в зомби апокалипсисе. Выбираете один из 7 перков, на ваш вкус, покупаете оружие, ищите укромное местечко и начинаете отстреливаться от волн зомби. Игра приобретает больший интерес, когда вы играете не один, а в компании людей.
This > COD Zombies.

A Really fun game when you got friends to play. Lots of levels and a variety of classes let you play in different ways. very fun and fast paced. its much funner to play with the steam workshop to get a bit more fun out of it. Highly Recommend you get it
forever a good game
Great Game! Bought it during a sale! Been worth every dollar.
A game where the floor is the least of your problems!!
Отстрел волн монстров в кооперативе. Отличная стрелялка для нескольких человек. Много людей и разных серваков. Не соскучитесь точно :)

i love the concept of this games, the teamwork. however as a newbie most of the time i lost my teammate and stuck behind after they lock the door.
and i wish there are zombie escape style mission.
Like tower defence but FPS

La verdad... es un juego de la put4 madre.
Con amigos te pasas horas jugando esto.
Recomiendo comprarlo si tenes amigos, amigos que lo tengan :v

Igual, anda ahorrando para el 2 ya va a saliiiir!!!
this game is amazing
buy this game. 10/10
Pretty decent game, fun with lots of friends. Got that left 4 dead vibe.

Excelente juego, muy entretenido y a la vez divertido. No me canso de jugarlo.
Uno de los mejores juegos de "Survival".
fun shooter with a few jumpscares if not careful

自分の好きな職業を選んでひたすらみんなとゾンビ倒すゲーム、これ以上説明することがないくらいシンプルなゲームです。
職業は全部で7タイプ、マップの数も標準ではそこまで多くはないですが、ワークショップで増やせますしオンラインではいろいろなカスタムマップもありますので、様々なステージで遊ぶことができます。
プレイヤーも基本的にやさしい人が多いのでやっていて暴言言われることはそこまでないかも・・・？ｗ
I just shoot a zombie in the nuts and it laugh.. 10/10

Killing Floor pode não ter os melhores gráficos, mas ainda assim é um dos melhores jogos cooperativos disponíveis. O maior defeito é que ele fica meio repetitivo com o tempo. Requisítos pra jogar bem baixos, grande variedade de armas, boa quantidade de mapas, com a vantagem de não possuir a obrigação de necessáriamente ter "X" jogadores disponíveis pra montar uma partida; Compre sem medo se você tiver um grupo de amigos pra jogar junto;
Eines der Besten Survival games, was ich je gespielt hab
Blood, over the top headshots, zombies. What more could you want?
Its swag
Terrifying, I played this game at night and you cant help but look behind you every scream. All around an amazing game

Se esse jogo fosse uma batata, seria uma boa batata! 

10/10

Killing Floor is the sole reason i even made a steam account. its a co-op survival game where teamwork is everything, you can do it on your own but to experience the best of this game you need friends. its certainly worth its price and i would buy it again just to  experience the carnage for the first time again with a full team where you fight for your life to kill all the specimens. i cannot reccomend this game more with fun achievements, addictive gameplay, and a concept that does not get old. its a must buy for anyone who has a steam!
Fun Team game with a lot of re-playability. Perks will take you some time to grind out but are worth it for there benefits. Constantly updated with new maps and weapons. Highly Recommend.
lovely :)
Fun game
The exact circumstances by which this ended up in my library are lost to time.
jaten la suite avec impatience terrible jeu en coop pas si evident que ca d'ailleur si on sentraide pa un minimum
Fun game. I enjoy it more than I do the Left 4 Dead series.
Ce jeu est un truc de malade , du kill , du kill , et du kill !!! et c'est trop cool a te drogue en moin de 2 avec ce bordel ! et j'adore sa :D
супер !!! Затягивает мутантов ложить!
dis game phun two plai muskt tri et owt
One of the best games I've ever played. A few bugs I've had with the workshop, but overall, great game. 9/10
Shoot things. Get money. Buy bigger gunz. Repeat.

Sem sombra de duvidas o melhor custo beneficio de suvivor horror jogo épico e aberto a mudanças 

RECOMENDADISSIMO!!
Brraaiinnssss!!!!!!!!

This game is GREAT! If you love FPS "zombie" carnage along with a FPS hack and slash, depending on your preference, then you will love this game. It comes along with different classes you can chose from and a leveling system for each class that is pretty easy to do. 5/5 is what i would rate this game!

Amazing "zombie" killing game, good level progressiosn, good amount and selection of servers, community is friendly.
Weapons are really nice to handle and the classes have their uniqeness, fun to play! Cant wait for KF2

Killing Floor es otro ejemplo de la poca tolerancia y odio que tienen los humanos hacia las cosas diferentes, y sus violentas y exageradas reacciones, que llegan incluso al uso de armas prohibidas por su crueldad, como el lanzallamas. Frente a este violento tratamiento, las pobres criaturas de Killing Floor, no tienen mas opción que defenderse yendo en oleadas suicidas con la pequeña esperanza de salvar a su especie. Sin embargo, este juego, tiene cámara lenta, así que es una obra maestra. 10/10
Good game quite scary at times
Хм... что сказать, весьма похожа на L4D2, однако имеет ряд плюшек отсутствующих  у собрата. В целов весьма играбельно вечерком с друзьями.
I killed so many floors, man.
Good game for blowing off heads.
jkijiouiuiijuiuiuuuu
TONS OF MULTIPLAYER FUN

Vraiment immersif si joué avec des potes !! 
Barres de rire garanties

Although the fighting is quite interesting it could have something more added to the game. Multiplayer as well as Singleplayer is lacking a certain type of UMPH. There needs to be something that provides incentive to continue playing the game. Maybe add a campaign so there's something to do when you're not wanting to play online or by yourself. Other than that the game is quite fun and well-made.
Very good game!
Hammergeiles Game mit gutem Suchtfaktor. Am besten Spielt man mit ein paar Kumpels

A BlTCH SCREAMED AT ME AND I DIED.

11/10

Awesome Game.
Very bloody and addictive v(^_^)v
больше мяса богу мяса!
Muy buen juego bastante adictivo aunque muy caro con todo y dlc
Классная игра! Если вы хотите с друзьями помочить зомби то эта игра специально для вас!
This game is a blast! I love getting together with people and killing some zombies. It just gets better with how many ways you can do it! From your shotty, katana, or even a modified rocket launcher.
Эта игра круче чем Left4dead
Floors have nothing to do with this game.
Awesome game. Been years since its com out, and I still play it, and enjoy it,
я рекомендую

Хорошая игра. И с left 4 dead не нужно её сравнивать это две непохожие по геймплею друг на друга игры. l4d нужно сделать определенное задание и там присутствуют волны. НО Killing Floor просто волны с толпами зомби разных классов. Смысл игры прожить до конца,купить оружие по круче и убить босса.
8\10
Оружие, мясо и металл - то, что нужно для бруталов!
игра насамом то деле очень хорошо жу 2 часть
Melhor co-op pra dar risada
Brutál jó :D
Good game ! Хорошая игра советую )
this game is false advertisiment you cant kill the floor believe me I tried
You should be playing this game. It's five dollars regularly and its worth more. So buy it.
bestes spiel !
Best part about the game is letting the other survivors die then making the round go for as long as possible. Perfect for those who enjoy being a absoulte wanker to other people.
Советую  хорошая игра , мясо толпызомби капец
One of the cheapest ways to have a lot of fun killing zombies with friends. Can't wait till Killing Floor 2 is released :D
Amazing Gore Game
котируется!
Норм. xD
Отличная игра! Похожа на зомби режим из call of duty: black ops 2, где надо покупать оружие и переживать волны зомби.
Epic zombie killing co-op game
muito bom, gráficos bom para um jogo antigo o ruim que não tem modo campanha :'(
Supervivencia como nunca antes, este juego no es para debiles el mas minimo error podria significar el fin.
More fun than genital mutilation. 10/10
i prefer soft metal music

ok to start off with if u love dead island and dead rissing those types of games zombies gore all the rest of it good but your not going to find a love and compasionet story here killing floor is pure multiplayer and solo survival and constantly gets updated to this day another great feature is that it also allows you to get skin packs and maps from steam workshop witch is freaking ace , now the big down side is that ive played this for like two nights and i have had nightmares its pretty grewsome but in a way awsome and killing floor two is coming out soon so why the fuck not i mean come on !!!!!!!! 710
Не знайте как убить время с друзьями? Эта игра создана для этого
This game is sick. Blood, Guts, Gore. Hell yeah
KF 2 inc

Игра с первого взгляда похожа на игру от вольво : left4dead , но на самом деле она в корни отличается от неё.Различные классы,множество скинов как игрока так и оружия (любой каприз за ваши деньги), неплохой онлайн , развитие по мере прохождения уровня (покупка различного  оружия , брони , патронов ) всё это отлиичает кф от л4д.Мне игра очень понравилась .
Жду второй части.
Моя оценка 8/10.Советую купить , своих денег стоит 100 %.
Awesome game !
